children.name: UPDATE "partner_stockrecord" SET "product_id" = 338, "partner_id" = 278, "partner_sku" = 'sku_338_8071', "price_currency" = 'GBP', "price" = 9.99, "num_in_stock" = 10, "num_allocated" = NULL, "low_stock_threshold" = NULL, "date_created" = '2024-07-22T17:26:56.566446+00:00'::timestamptz, "date_updated" = '2024-07-22T17:26:56.624160+00:00'::timestamptz, "offer_name" = NULL WHERE "partner_stockrecord"."id" = 317
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "__count" FROM "customer_productalert" WHERE ("customer_productalert"."product_id" IN (338) AND "customer_productalert"."status" = 'Active')

SELECT "customer_productalert"."id", "customer_productalert"."product_id", "customer_productalert"."user_id", "customer_productalert"."email", "customer_productalert"."key", "customer_productalert"."status", "customer_productalert"."date_created", "customer_productalert"."date_confirmed", "customer_productalert"."date_cancelled", "customer_productalert"."date_closed" FROM "customer_productalert" WHERE ("customer_productalert"."product_id" IN (338) AND "customer_productalert"."status" = 'Active') ORDER BY "customer_productalert"."date_created" DESC
